sentence: Why did the egyptian spit out his water? because it came from the suez.
explanation: A waterway in Egypt that serves as a passage for ships (first meaning) and can also colloquially refer to sue someone or something (second meaning)
first_new_sentence: The Suez Canal is crucial for international maritime trade.
second_new_sentence: She decided to sue her former employer for wrongful termination.

sentence: Why was diarrhoea classified under hereditary diseases? it runs in the jeans.
explanation: To operate or function (first meaning) and to move quickly (second meaning)
first_new_sentence: The machine runs efficiently when properly maintained.
second_new_sentence: He runs every morning to keep fit.

sentence: What do you call a surprise party in india? arranged marriage p.s. im an indian living in india.
explanation: To organize or plan in advance (first meaning) and the often traditional setting of a marriage (second meaning)
first_new_sentence: They arranged for the guests to arrive at 6 PM.
second_new_sentence: Their arranged marriage was celebrated by both families.
